min: This field must be at least {{number}} characters.
max: This field must be at most {{number}} characters.
lessThan: This field must be less than {{less}}.
moreThan: This field must be greater than {{more}}.
arrayMin: This field must have at least {{min}} items.
arrayMax: This field must have at most {{max}} items.
oneOf: This field must be one of the following: {{values}}.
notOneOf: This field cannot be one of the following: {{values}}.
equals: This field must be the same as {{reference}}.
